name: It's Raining Robots!
description:
Developed in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

The apocalypse is here! To protect your city from molten doom, you must hastily build a wall out of your robotic citizens. Be careful! Your citizens don't get along well with others (and really don't like falling :O) and can destabilize your engineering marvel!

Controls: 

Click (not drag) on the citizens as they are carted in to grab them (before they fall off the conveyor belt). 

While held use Q/E to rotate around (and hold left shift for finer control).

Click (not drag) or press spacebar to release the citizens onto the pile.

Credits: 

Programming: Jackson N., Austin W., Kevin N.

Art: Alex W., David N., Cooper S., Chris N.
